title: Authors and Citation
text: Winskill P (2024). site: Site specific malariasimulation modelling. R package version 1.0.4.
code: @Manual{,   title = {site: Site specific malariasimulation modelling},   author = {Pete Winskill},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.0.4}, }

title: Site specific malariasimulation modelling
text: Site acts translational layer site file malariasimulation: üåç ‚û°Ô∏è üìâ site file file storing context specific information site, historical intervention coverage, seasonality, vectors etc. simulate given site, must convert information input parameter list malaria simulation. site ! correctly configured site file example_site, need create parameter list pass malariasimulation run:
code: site <- subset_site(example_site, example_site$eir[1,]) site_par <- site_parameters(   interventions = site$interventions,   demography = site$demography,   vectors = site$vectors$vector_species,   seasonality = site$seasonality$seasonality_parameters,   eir = site$eir$eir,   overrides = list(     human_population = 1000   ) ) site_sim <- malariasimulation::run_simulation(   timesteps = site_par$timesteps,   parameters = site_par )

title: An example country site file ‚Äî example_site
An example country site file ‚Äî example_site
text: list 10 variables: country country name version Site file version admin_level levels spatial disaggregation sites Unique sites shape Sptial boundaries (set NA testing shapefile) cases_deaths Epidemiological site data prevalence Prevalence data interventions Intervention coverage specification population Population, population risk mand age-disaggregated population projections demography Demographic projections vectors Vector specieis pyrethroid resistance seasonality Seasonal profile parameters, monthly rainfall fourier predictions blood_disorders Blood disorder data accessibility Accessibility data eir Calibrated eir

what: Get files from the malariaverse sitefile server. ‚Äî fetch_files
title: Get files from the malariaverse sitefile server. ‚Äî fetch_files
Get files from the malariaverse sitefile server. ‚Äî fetch_files
code: fetch_files(name, parameters, dest, files, expr = NULL)

title: Get files from the malariaverse sitefile server. ‚Äî fetch_files
text: name name orderly report. parameters named list parameters use searching orderly packet. query expression `expr` specified, parameters substituted query using : prefix. expression specified, latest packet matching parameters exactly selected. dest directory files copied. files optionally-named character vector files copy packet destination directory. vector named, names used destination file path. expr query expression filter packets. may arbitrary orderly query, including literal packet ID. absent NULL, specified list parameters used matched exactly.

title: Get files from the malariaverse sitefile server. ‚Äî fetch_files

title: Fetch a site file for a country from the malariaverse sitefile server. ‚Äî fetch_site

Create site parameters ‚Äî site_parameters
code: site_parameters(   interventions,   demography,   vectors,   seasonality,   min_ages = c(0, 5, 15) * 365,   species = "pf",   eir = NULL,   overrides = list(),   burnin = 0 )

title: Create site parameters ‚Äî site_parameters
text: interventions Site intervention inputs demography Site demography inputs vectors Site vectors inputs seasonality Site seasonality inputs min_ages Lower age bands incidence N age outputs species Can falciparum: "pf" vivax: "pv", vivax SMC, RTSS PMC implemented eir Site baseline EIR overrides List malariasimulation default parameter overrides burnin Number burn years
